metadata.title: CVE-2022-42929 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: If a website called `window.print()` in a particular way, it could cause adenial of service of the browser, which may persist beyond browser restartdepending on the user's session restore settings. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 106, Firefox ESR < 102.4, and Thunderbird < 102.4.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
